data.eml:eml: Myrmica afghanica (Hymenoptera: Formicidae), a new ant species from Afghanistan.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Radchenko, A. G., Elmes, G. W. (2003): Myrmica afghanica (Hymenoptera: Formicidae), a new ant species from Afghanistan. Zootaxa 375: 1-8, URL: http://atbi.biosci.ohio-state.edu/HymOnline/reference-full.html?id=20235
